title: Introducing Stargate UK
content: OpenAI, NVIDIA, and Nscale launch Stargate UK, a sovereign AI infrastructure partnership delivering up to 50,000 GPUs and the UKâ€™s largest supercomputer to power national AI innovation, public services, and economic growth.
author: OpenAI Blog
summary:
Key Takeaway:
The UK has launched Stargate UK, a groundbreaking partnership between OpenAI, NVIDIA, and Nscale, to build the country's largest supercomputer and provide up to 50,000 GPUs to drive national AI innovation, enhance public services, and spur economic growth.

Why It Matters:
This initiative positions the UK as a global leader in AI development, enabling the country to harness the transformative power of this technology to address pressing challenges, improve government operations, and foster a thriving AI-driven economy.

Brief Context:
Recognizing the strategic importance of AI, the UK government has collaborated with leading technology companies to establish Stargate UK, a comprehensive infrastructure project that will provide the resources and computational power necessary to accelerate the nation's AI capabilities and drive long-term, sustainable progress.

faq.question: What is Stargate UK?
faq.answer: Stargate UK is a new sovereign AI infrastructure partnership launched by OpenAI, NVIDIA, and Nscale. It aims to deliver up to 50,000 GPUs and the UK's largest supercomputer to power national AI innovation, public services, and economic growth in the United Kingdom.

faq.question: What is the purpose of Stargate UK?
faq.answer: The main purpose of Stargate UK is to build a powerful AI infrastructure and computing platform to drive AI-powered innovation, improve public services, and boost economic growth in the UK. By providing access to advanced GPU hardware and supercomputing resources, Stargate UK will enable more organizations and researchers to develop and deploy cutting-edge AI applications.

faq.question: Who are the partners behind Stargate UK?
faq.answer: Stargate UK is a collaboration between three leading technology organizations - OpenAI, NVIDIA, and Nscale. OpenAI is a prominent AI research company, NVIDIA is a major manufacturer of high-performance GPUs, and Nscale is a UK-based supercomputing provider. Together, these partners are pooling their expertise and resources to build this national AI infrastructure for the UK.

faq.question: How will Stargate UK benefit the UK economy and public sector?
faq.answer: By providing access to world-class AI computing power, Stargate UK is expected to accelerate the development and deployment of AI-powered innovations across various industries in the UK. This could lead to productivity gains, new business opportunities, and improved public services that leverage AI capabilities. The goal is for Stargate UK to position the UK as a global leader in practical AI applications and drive economic growth through AI-fueled innovation.

faq.question: What kind of AI applications and use cases will Stargate UK support?
faq.answer: Stargate UK is designed to support a wide range of AI use cases, from advanced scientific research and modeling to AI-powered public services and industrial applications. The platform's immense computing power could enable breakthroughs in fields like healthcare, climate change mitigation, smart city infrastructure, and more. Researchers, businesses, and government agencies in the UK will be able to leverage Stargate UK's resources to develop and deploy transformative AI solutions.
